Title: Nyan Cat!!!1!
Description:
In Debian and Ubuntu, you can install it using:
# apt-get install nyancat

The options I used mean:

-n, --no-counter
Do not display the timer.
-s, --no-title
Do not set the titlebar text.
-f, --frames
Display the requested number of frames, then quit.

44 frames equates to about 4 seconds, which is the same amount of time it takes my machine to run sl.
